(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB Why))
    (SQ (VBZ is)
      (NP (NNP Christmas) (DT a) (NN paradox)))
    (. ?)))

nn(paradox-5, Christmas-3)
det(paradox-5, a-4)

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Well))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Well-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (CD one) (NN way))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB define)
              (NP (NN paradox)))))))
    (VP (VBZ is) (`` ``)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN situation))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
              (PP (IN if)
                (ADJP (JJ true)))
              (-RRB- -RRB-))
            (VP (VBZ defies)
              (NP (NN logic)
                (CC or)
                (NN reason)))))))
    ('' '') (. .)))


num(way-2, one-1)
nsubj(situation-9, way-2)
aux(define-4, to-3)
infmod(way-2, define-4)
dobj(define-4, paradox-5)
cop(situation-9, is-6)
det(situation-9, a-8)
root(ROOT-0, situation-9)
nsubj(defies-15, which-10)
dep(defies-15, if-12)
pobj(if-12, true-13)
rcmod(situation-9, defies-15)
dobj(defies-15, logic-16)
cc(logic-16, or-17)
conj(logic-16, reason-18)

    (WHNP (WP what))

        (NP (PRP it))
        (PP (IN about)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Christmas))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT that))
              (S
                (VP (VBZ defies)
                  (NP (NN logic)))))))))
    (. ?)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD came)
      (PP (IN across)
        (NP
          (NP (DT this) (NN video))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT which))
            (S
              (VP (VBD was)
                (ADJP (JJ helpful)
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (S
                      (VP (VBG reminding)))))))))))))

            (NP (NNP God))

              (NP (PRP me))

    (, ,)))

                              (VP
                                (VP (VBP have))
                                (CC or)

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP need)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB let)
            (S
              (NP (PRP it))
              (VP (VB sink)
                (PRT (RP in))
                (SBAR (RB so) (IN that)
                  (S
                    (NP (DT the) (NN love))
                    (VP (VBZ is)
                      (VP (VBN transmitted)
                        (PP (IN from)
                          (NP (PRP$ my) (NN head)))
                        (PP (TO to)
                          (NP (PRP$ my) (NN heart)))
                        (SBAR (IN so)
                          (S
                            (NP (PRP I))
                            (VP (MD can)
                              (VP (VB shake)
                                (PRT (RP off))
                                (NP (DT this) (NNP Scroogey) (NN demeanor))))))))))))))))
    (. !)))

mark(transmitted-14, that-10)

    (VP
      (VP (VB Have)
        (NP (DT a) (NNP Blessed) (NNP Christmas) (NN everyone)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (MD may)

          (NP (NN you))
          (RB all))
        (VP (VB find)
          (NP (NN love)))
        (, ,)))))
